node_network.notice_join: Please purchase one Plan to invite your friends and extend your node network.
node_network.invite_confirm: You haven't completed your contact information. Please complete contact information to invite friends to your node network.

overview.chart-subtitle: The chart shows the amount of daily profit & commission over time

question.answer_1: Balance consists of Account Balance, Daily Profit, Direct Commission, Branching Commission. Anyway, you only withdraw with a limit of 4 times the amount of the plan purchased.
question.answer_2: What is Staking? When you have withdrawn to the allowable limit that depends on your plan. Balance Pending is the amount that can not be withdrawn, you need to buy suitable investment package to withdraw the remaining balance.
question.answer_3: The remaining staking amount. You will hold your investment package for a period of time.
question.answer_4: Profit per day that you receive after purchasing Plan.
question.question_5: What is Total Principal from Stake?
question.answer_5: The principal amount is refunded daily based on your investment package that you buy.
question.answer_6: Direct Commission received after you invite  friends to your node network.
question.answer_7: You will receive 10% commission of less-money branching.
